category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_partnumber_separator
preference.preference_description: Use the Part Number Separator variable to define the separator used when building the part number; it is also used in CAA for the name of PDF files. This character is used as a separator to build the default reference name, i.e, ItemID_ItemRevID_ItemRevName.
